Comments_List: Specific knowledge about carbon market mechanisms and international policy rulemaking.
improved research and team work skills

Strengths: Gives students opportunity to work on a real life project with an organization of interest, which allows student to gain valuable experience and create useful deliverables/outputs.
Weakness: Project selection process is hard to understand and not always transparent.

Mid-semester and end-of-semester evaluations should be implemented. I have been on a couple of teams where one or more team members is not holding up their end and there should be a formal way to check-in and hopefully remedy this. I also ended up on a team with a student who had zero interest in this topic-- not sure how this happened, but seeing as it is a client based project and this student could care less, this was really problematic.
Little guidance from yale supervisor, but good client experience
I recommend taking it, although I would recommend you be strategic about the client you pick and the team you join, as those elements can make or brake the experience.
